sys_script_include.name: BuscaSysIdByName

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1174267_solici_0.BuscaSysIdByName</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>BuscaSysIdByName</name><script><![CDATA[var BuscaSysIdByName = Class.create();
BuscaSysIdByName.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	search: function (nome){
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		gr.addEncodedQuery("nameLIKE" + nome);
		gr.query();

		while(gr.next()){
		gs.info(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
		}
	},

    type: 'BuscaSysIdByName'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-22 20:54:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>66ed2f45976c0a105e9fb680f053af1b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>BuscaSysIdByName</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Solicitação de Crédito" source="x_1174267_solici_0">20d0b15f4727311008334d05516d430e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Solicitação de Crédito">20d0b15f4727311008334d05516d430e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_66ed2f45976c0a105e9fb680f053af1b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-22 20:54:03</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
